title: Skin in the Game
description: We run Koi Roofing and Solar. Every strategy we recommend is one we use ourselves. We don't give advice we wouldn't take.

title: Results Over Reports
description: We don't hide behind dashboards and metrics. We care about one thing: did your phone ring with qualified leads? Everything else is noise.

title: Straight Talk
description: No jargon, no runaround. We tell you what's working, what's not, and what we're doing about it. Contractor to contractor.

title: Show Up and Deliver
description: Veteran-owned means we understand commitment. When we say we'll do something, it gets done. Period.

title: Long-Term Thinking
description: We're not here for quick wins that don't last. We build systems that compound over time â€” real assets for your business.
